LanguageData.Eye.label: Eye
LanguageData.Eye.description: A replacement eye that was either removed from a live body, or fabricated from BioMatter.
LanguageData.Ear.label: Ear
LanguageData.Ear.description: A replacement ear fabricated from BioMatter.
LanguageData.Nose.label: Nose
LanguageData.Nose.description: A replacement nose fabricated from BioMatter.
LanguageData.Heart.label: Heart
LanguageData.Heart.description: Supplies blood and oxygen to all parts of the body. Ready to find a new owner.
LanguageData.Lung.label: Lung
LanguageData.Lung.description: An essential part of the respiratory system.
LanguageData.Liver.label: Liver
LanguageData.Liver.description: Plays an important role in metabolism.
LanguageData.Kidney.label: Kidney
LanguageData.Kidney.description: Filters and removes waste products from the blood.
LanguageData.Stomach.label: Stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: Jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
LanguageData.Leg.label: Leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: They're long meaty sticks that let you move around.
LanguageData.Arm.label: Arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.
LanguageData.Foot.label: foot
LanguageData.Foot.description: The thing you can put shoes on.
LanguageData.Hand.label: hand
